name: team 2 - vincent (person man)
description:
join person man as he attempts to climb a mountain, unfortunately he has no idea how difficult this task will be.

CONTROLS:

P - activate / deactivate 2 player mode

Player 1: 

W - jump

A - move left

D - move right

S - fall through certain platforms

Q - heal

E - interact

Player 2:

Up arrow - jump

Left arrow - move left

Right arrow - move right

Down arrow - fall through platform

Slash ( / ) - heal
